Package com.bigdata.rdf.task

Abstraction layer for task-based concurrency at the triple store layer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IApiTask<T>
    A task that can be run either with direct index access or using the concurrency manager (compatible with group commit).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractApiTask<T>
    Base class for task-oriented concurrency.
    ApiTaskForIndexManager<T>
    Wrapper for a task to be executed in a stand-off fashion.
    ApiTaskForJournal<T>
    Wrapper for a task to be executed on the IConcurrencyManager of a Journal.

Package com.bigdata.rdf.task Description

Abstraction layer for task-based concurrency at the triple store layer. This package provides the basic abstraction and integration to support group commit by executing tasks on the ConcurrencyManager.
